attributes.action: Give WW2 Veteran Capt. Thomas Moore a Knighthood for raising £10m+ for the NHS!
attributes.additional_details:
I want Captain Thomas Moore to be given a Knighthood. In World War 2 he served in Duke of Wellingtons Regiment in 135 Royal Armoured Corps fighting in India and Burma. Later, he then became an Armoured Warfare Instructor. 

Captain Moore has also just raised more than £10 million for the NHS by walking 25 metre lengths in his back garden with his Zimmer after aiming for a Target of £1,000.

Let’s all get signing and give this Hero and Legend what he deserves!!!
attributes.background: I want Captain Thomas Moore (145 Royal Armoured Corps) to be given a Knighthood.

rejection.details:
In any case we can't publish petitions calling for people to receive an honour. You can find out more about the honours process and how to nominate someone at

www.gov.uk/honours
